channel.title: Staking Airdrop #2 of Delphibets
channel.description:
üõë **STAKERS PAY ATTENTION!** After exciting and successful (prediction) events, we want to focus on the stakers again:
üî• **500,000 $DPH will be distributed** üî•
1Ô∏è‚É£ Staking snapshot is taken on 15th of May 2022 2Ô∏è‚É£ The more you stake, the bigger your airdrop 3Ô∏è‚É£ STAKE ON THE DELPHINODE TO RECEIVE 50% AIRDROP BONUS üòç
Stakers of the [DELPHINODE](https://www.radixscan.io/validator/rv1qtj3zvu8ttar6mluw6qzlfu5mnjqpeswcjs07ayalyx4gje4wy4xwq85hhs) have advantages and will receive the [highest bonus](https://t.me/delphibets/12347). item.title: Staking Airdrop #2 of Delphibets
item.dc:creator: DELPHIBETS
item.description:
STAKERS PAY ATTENTION!
After exciting and successful (prediction) events, we want to focus on the stakers again:

500,000 $DPH will be distributed

Staking snapshot is taken on 15th of May 2022
The more you stake, the bigger your airdrop
STAKE ON THE DELPHINODE TO RECEIVE 50% AIRDROP BONUS

Stakers of the DELPHINODE have advantages and will receive the highest bonus. The airdrop will follow in the next few days after the snapshot is taken. Starting in May we will introduce a validator fee in line with other Radix nodes of 2.8%.

How to stake $XRD?
For those who want to stake on the DELPHINODE for the first time, Pythia has recorded a video. It was her concern to explain you all in the most simple way, so you can get as many $DPH as possible

https://www.youtube.com/embed/wX1qB2p1Dns

Stay tuned and visit our Telegram channel or follow us on Twitter.

The validator stake of the DELPHINODE is currently 1.65%. Only 0.35% remain to secure the 50% bonus.

Read full topic
